ref: 11998 vísarpin ʻ creeping ʼ MBh., m. ʻ erysipelas or other creeping disease ʼ, visarpa -- m. Suśr., ˚pikā -- f. VarBr̥S. [Cf. visarpaṇa -- ʻ creeping ʼ, Pa. visappana -- ʻ spreading ʼ. -- √sr̥p]
M. visap, ˚ab, isap, ˚ab, isāp, ˚āb, isūp, ˚ūb m. ʻ an itch or scab attacking the wrists, a large dark red cattle tick ʼ.
